title: River Edge I Panadura
details:
Panadura BOLGODA River (Talpitiya) facing land plots. Majority of lots with RIVER ACCESS. River Edge is located strategically by the Talpitiya River’s widest area, offering the exclusive lifestyle of a select, gated community. River Edge comprises 14 beautifully developed plots of land, complete with three phase electricity and water.

• 100 meters to GALLE ROAD
• A high-end neighborhood in a highly residential area
• 2 minutes from School, Govt. Offices and other important places

Call us now
